actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Select Revenue Measures.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt conventions, et cetera, held on cruise ships documented under the laws of the United States from certain rules relating to foreign conventions.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to revise requirements for the deduction of expenses incurred in attending a convention, seminar, or other meeting held on a domestic cruise ship documented under the laws of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt conventions, et cetera, held on cruise ships documented under the laws of the United States from certain rules relating to foreign conventions.
